author: junsong_eth
content: For whom working on zkVM, I found [the book](https://eth-act.github.io/zkevm-book/introduction.html) from EF Applied Cryptography Team (eth-act) gives lots of intuition. It's still under construction, but still it provides plenty of handy info. (I love [part 2](https://eth-act.github.io/zkevm-book/trees/internal/internals.html) most)

author: tmiychao
content:
Next week, we will hold Office Hours on Thursday instead of Wednesday! We will have a special guest, Justin, who couldn't make it on Wednesday so we rescheduled to make it possible. Hope many of you will be able to join!
